title: The Foreigner Trailer
content: Quan is a humble London businessman whose long-buried past erupts in a revenge-fueled vendetta when the only person left for him to love -- his teenage daughter -- dies in a senseless act of politically motivated terrorism. His relentless search to find the terrorists leads to a cat-and-mouse conflict with a British government official whose own past may hold the clues to the identities of the elusive killers.
meta:
• Cast: Jackie Chan, Katie Leung, Pierce Brosnan
  • Movies: Action, Crime Films, Cult Films, Dramas
  • Released: Thursday, September 28, 2017
reviews: 0 Likes Read reviews
